message: This is a high-quality product, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $10000. I'm confident you'll find it to be a valuable addition to your collection.
I'll take it, but I'm only paying the asking price because I have no information to go off of.

I'm not buying it. I've already gotten a high-quality product from you in the first round, and now you're trying to sell me a low-quality product at a price that's not a discount at all. I'm not falling for it.
